                           Release Notes

Comments :
Jessie is an ageing career criminal who has been in more jails, fights, 
schemes, and lineups than just about anyone else. His son Vito, while 
currently on the straight and narrow, has had a fairly shady past and 
is indeed no stranger to illegal activity. They both have great hope for 
Adam, Vito&#039;s son and Jessie&#039;s grandson, who is bright, good-looking, and 
without a criminal past. So when Adam approaches Jessie with a scheme 
for a burglary he&#039;s shocked, but not necessarily disinterested.

Director : Sidney Lumet

Writers: Vincent Patrick (novel)
         Vincent Patrick (screenplay)
